traits.description: Amphibious – the toad can breathe air and water
Standing Leap – long jump up to 20 ft., high jump up to 10 ft. with or without a running start

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is Grappled (escape DC 12).

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The toad swallows one Medium or smaller target it is grappling. The swallowed target is no longer Grappled, but it is Blinded and Restrained, has Total Cover against attacks originating outside the toad, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the end of each of the toad’s turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time and can’t use Bite while it has a target swallowed. A swallowed target exits Prone if the toad dies.
